subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में खुली हैंगर कौन सा?
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a famous palace located in Jaipur, known for its unique architecture.
explanation_hi: हवा महाल, Jaipur में उपस्थित पुल, उनकी अपनी निवेशन बढ़ी है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rani of Rajasthan supported the Indian National Congress?
question_hi: राजस्थान के एक निवेशन कौनसी भारतीय निवशेंट समर्थ करने के लिए।
explanation_en: Maharani Kumari Kamla was a prominent figure who supported the Indian National Congress movement in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: महाराणी कम्ला राजस्थान निवेशन कांस्टम मंवर्तियां को मदरारु

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical monument is located in Jaipur?
C_en: Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II
C_hi: सावाई महाराज सावाई मंगलों का कौने है।
explanation_en: The Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh II is a historical monument located in Jaipur.
explanation_hi: सावाई महाराज सावाई मंगलों में हैं।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Rathore Rajput king of Jaipur?
question_hi: जापुर के पहलेंगा राजोत्तों कोणी कौने हैं।
explanation_en: Jai Singh II was the first Rathore Rajput king of Jaipur.
explanation_hi: जय सिंगी जाय सिंगी जाय सिंगी

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the queen of Maharaja Man Singh II?
question_hi: मान सिंगी जाय सिंगी जाय सिंगी
explanation_en: Princess Kanwar Kanta was the queen of Maharaja Man Singh II, who ruled during the Mughal period.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Where is the Amber Fort located?
explanation_en: Dushasth Rathore was a famous medieval king who governed Rajasthan.
